abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Chicago Blackhawks, 4-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Blackhawks star sidestepped questions about his own feelings and focused on his family in his first public comments since the authorities in upstate New York concluded a three-month investigation by deciding that he should not face criminal charges.

headline.main: As Rape Investigation Ends, Patrick Kane Is Relieved for Family
headline.print_headline: Early Goals Send Devils Past Chicago
